ygData.subject: Mesmerize...
ygData.msgSnippet: Does Mesmerize (single target level 4 spell) have a mind wipe effect to it? Last night I was at the GFay 3 spawn bandit camp and with a bad pull, I had 2 on
ygData.messageBody:
Does Mesmerize (single target level 4 spell) have a mind wipe effect to it?
Last night I was at the GFay 3 spawn bandit camp and with a bad pull, I had
2 on me. Bandit #2 spawned as the #1 was running at me. =( I killed #1
which leveled me to 8th (yay!) and had 1 bubble of health, and my pet was
dead. I turned off my attack and tried to mes. I forgot to Tashan, so by the
time it stuck, I had a sliver of life left. I backed up the hill (30 to 40
feet) and sat down to med and get enough mana for a fear and also to heal up
as I didn't have bandages either. When my "Your Mesmerize spell has worn
off." message came up I didn't move trying to get one last tick of health /
mana, and waiting to get whacked to auto stand up. It never happened.

Did I just back up to far for the agro to kick in? Or did the Mesmerize wipe
me from the hate list as I hadn't actually hit the bandit in melee?

Oh, btw I have looted 3 vials of elven blood from the bandits that have
woodelf graphic models. This is for the new armor, but I can't remember
which ones.

Thanks for your replies in advance.

--
Uthanatos
8th Facet in the Jewel of Norrath
Fennin
